page.title: 09Childrens Games _ continued
page.content: football, bikes, hide+seek, soldiers, water-pistols,swings,listen to their personal stereo and kick the ball. Girls in P.5+6 in school like to play at elastics, beds, balls, football, netball + tig.The older boys like football, soldiers, walk the plank join the crew,fighting,work+reading, girls ,playing football,hide+seek, balls, elastics, chases, beds, trophy bikes, kirby, tig, jump the backs, jump the wall, walk the wall, go to the park, ropes, sun-bathing, jump the garages, code, flag the taxis, rounders, kick the ball, ABC,kick the can, go to the park, watch the T.V., baby doll, blind man bluff.
